subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Despite assurances from ownership that Willie Randolph’s job was never in jeopardy, on Monday the Mets’ manager still seemed to be fighting to stay in the dugout for the long term.
snippet: Despite assurances from ownership that Willie Randolph’s job was never in jeopardy, on Monday the Mets’ manager still seemed to be fighting to stay in the dugout for the long term.
